name: Ecolis: Aoi Umi to Ugoku Shima
name_original: Ecolis: Aoi Umi to Ugoku Shima
description:
Mecha Mecha Company has arrived on the lush green island of Taisai. Protect the green earth, the blue sea, and the world from humans who are trying to consume the blessing of the earth "mana" as an energy resource!

This game is a simulation RPG that explores the world on a "moving island", seeks out the spirits of the forest and the sea, develops powerful eco-mechanisms and parts by recycling, and confronts powerful enemies. A mahou apprentice, Dori-bo, runs around the ocean in search of a "Yamagami egg" that is somewhere in the world to save Dorian, who has become a sacred tree to protect the forest.
You can do over 100 battles, gather over 400 friends, customize maps, play wireless battles, and even play Wi-Fi battles.

Even incandescent battles with more than 100 enemies and allies can be easily operated with a touch pen. Stop the overdevelopment of the mighty Mecha Mecha Company with the ever-increasing number of friends by planting trees and picking up trash!
